COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15c
STRING: The traces of light that crept in through the window had
become fainter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x172
STRING: The sky was covered with dense clouds as always, but
it was still bright enough for the town not to need
street lights during the day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192
STRING: Because of this, I often wouldn't notice my room slowly
becoming darker as the sun moved behind the clouds.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b2
STRING: After playing my Fortelle with its sound muffled, and
reading the book I had borrowed from Asino, it
eventually became more or less night time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x206
STRING: [Phorni] “Isn't it about time for dinner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21c
STRING: Phorni asked this question to let me know what time it
was, as I had sat down at my Fortelle again and started
playing an improvised song.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23c
STRING: Even though Phorni would hum along to the melody of
whatever I played, when the time came for something
to be done, she always remembered.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25c
STRING: She was annoying at times, but for someone who was
as forgetful of time as I was, she was a lifesaver.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x272
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? It's already that time of day?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x288
STRING: I stretched my arms out above my head and took a look
at the clock, and found that it was still only a little after
six.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29e
STRING: We didn't have a perfectly fixed dinner time, but I felt
that this was a little earlier than usual.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b4
STRING: [Chris] “Hm? Isn't it still a bit early?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d2
STRING: [Phorni] “A little, yeah. But... There was something I
wanted to ask you about.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f2
STRING: [Chris] “Oh? What could that be?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x324
STRING: [Phorni] “What are you plans for dinner tonight?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33a
STRING: [Chris] “What do you mean...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x350
STRING: I detected a hint of something serious in Phorni's usual
light tone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x382
STRING: [Phorni] “Well... I was wondering if maybe you were
gonna eat out again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x398
STRING: [Chris] “Hm? Oh right, it's Saturday. Yeah, that might be
a nice idea.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ca
STRING: [Phorni] “You'd forgotten...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e0
STRING: [Chris] “No, I hadn't forgotten. I just wasn't going to
think about dinner until the time actually came.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41c
STRING: [Phorni] “I see...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x432
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x464
STRING: [Phorni] “It's nothing...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x47a
STRING: [Chris] “That's what you wanted to ask me about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x498
STRING: [Phorni] “I guess so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ae
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c4
STRING: Why would she have wanted to ask about that?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d0
STRING: And why would she have thought that I was thinking
about eating out?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x502
STRING: [Phorni] “It's nothing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x530
STRING: I was just wondering, that's all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x53c
STRING: [Chris] “Why did you think I would eat out tonight?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55a
STRING: [Phorni] “Because you and Fal have been practicing a
lot together these days.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x570
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... I guess we have.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a2
STRING: [Phorni] “Tell me, what's she like?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5b8
STRING: [Chris] “She's really diligent. I told you that before, didn't

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ea
STRING: [Phorni] “But that's just a first impression.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x618
STRING: I wanna know
more about her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x62e
STRING: [Chris] “Why the sudden interest?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x660
STRING: [Phorni] “Well, it seems like you two practice a lot
together, so naturally I started to wonder.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x680
STRING: [Chris] “Fair enough. I guess we have been practicing a
lot. But, what kind of person is she? Hmm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a0
STRING: The truth was that I wasn't entirely sure, either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ac
STRING: [Chris] “That's a difficult question.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c2
STRING: I wasn't sure if she was listening to me or not...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ce
STRING: Because for a while Phorni just tilted her head to the
side in thought, murmuring for a while, before suddenly
raising her voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x700
STRING: [Phorni] “In that case, I'll go with you!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x716
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x734
STRING: [Phorni] “I wanna see what she's like!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x74a
STRING: [Chris] “You do realize that-”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77c
STRING: [Phorni] “I won't take no for an answer! If you try to say
no, I'll tell Arie everything.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x79c
STRING: [Chris] “And how are you going to do that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ba
STRING: [Phorni] “You just watch! I'll use this pen and...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d0
STRING: The pen was about the same size as her body. Once
she had wrapped her arms around it in an attempt to lift
it, I picked up the pen by its tip, with Phorni
hanging from it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x80c
STRING: [Phorni] “Oomph.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x822
STRING: She didn't seem to have the strength to hold on, and
soon slipped off the pen, fluttering her wings.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x854
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey, whaddya think you're doing?!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x86a
STRING: [Chris] “Didn't you learn the first time? You just can't do
it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x89c
STRING: [Phorni] “B-But!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b2
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, okay. If it'll make you happy, I'll bring you
along.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8e4
STRING: [Phorni] “R-Really? Are you sure?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8fa
STRING: [Chris] “Well, it's better than having you make a mess of
my letters. Remember, she's working, okay? There's no
guarantee we'll actually see her, so don't go
complaining if we don't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x940
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay! I'm sure I can get a peek if I go looking
for her, anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x960
STRING: [Chris] “It'd be great if you didn't do anything stupid,
though... Anyway, I guess I'm the only one who needs
to get ready to go out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x99c
STRING: [Phorni] “Of course I won't! I'm ready to go any time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9b2
STRING: Phorni didn't need to do anything before going out, so
once the decision to go to Fal's trattoria was made, she
started fluttering about happily, telling me
to hurry up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ee
STRING: [Phorni] “Chris, you're such a slowpoke!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa04
STRING: [Chris] “Unlike you, Phorni, my body obeys the laws of
physics. Don't treat me like another musical fairy, or
whatever you are.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa32
STRING: I changed out of my house clothes, and put on
something slightly more respectable.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa3e
STRING: The rain didn't seem to be so heavy, but I still had to
choose what I wore carefully.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa54
STRING: Even if we were just going to a trattoria, there was
always the possibility that Fal would see me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa6a
STRING: Unlike the town that Arie lived in, it was still warm here
so I didn't need a coat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa80
STRING: I put on a thick jacket, and then stood at the front door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa8c
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni, I'm ready! Come on.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xabe
STRING: [Phorni] “You took forever!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xadc
STRING: Hearing that I was ready, Phorni fluttered her wings
happily.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf2
STRING: I would never say it to her face as she'd get angry, but
she was kind of like a pet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb1e
STRING: She leaped vigorously from the table, and fell... Or
perhaps I should say glided, to where I was waiting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb34
STRING: I caught her in my hand before she hit the ground, and
then placed her on my shoulder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb5c
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay, let's go!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb72
STRING: [Chris] “Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbba
STRING: It was slightly cold out on the street.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc6
STRING: For the mysterious little fairy on my shoulder, the rain
and cold both meant nothing, and she happily gazed
down the street.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbf8
STRING: [Phorni] “This way? Is it this way?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc0e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, it's this way. We're heading there right
now, so you can go without an explanation, right? Also,
it's not like you're doing the walking anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc54
STRING: [Phorni] “That's beside the point. It's been so long since
I've done this!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6a
STRING: [Chris] “That's true...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc80
STRING: Looking at Phorni happily taking in the city, I
remembered that it really had been a while for her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc96
STRING: She seemed very pleased to be going out somewhere.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca2
STRING: Although, she never really said that she wanted to go
out in the first place, so I had always assumed she didn't
care.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc2
STRING: Perhaps it was simply because she'd heard all these
things about Fal, and was now able to see for herself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd8
STRING: [Chris] “This makes you happy?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd0a
STRING: [Phorni] “Hm?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd38
STRING: Of course, it's been a while, you know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd44
STRING: She shook her wings a little, and it kind of tickled my
ear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd5a
STRING: [Chris] “Hey... Sit still.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd8c
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, sorry!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda2
STRING: [Chris] “And, are you happy because you're going to
meet Fal?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd4
STRING: [Phorni] “That's one reason, but mainly because we're
outside!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdea
STRING: [Chris] “You could just go outside whenever you feel
like it, you know? Ah... Is it because you can't fly to high
places with those wings?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe26
STRING: [Phorni] “No, I could go out on my own if I wanted. I
could just walk! But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe46
STRING: [Chris] “Hm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe78
STRING: [Phorni] “But going out all by myself?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe8e
STRING: [Chris] “I... You know I have school, and...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec0
STRING: [Phorni] “Ah! I didn't mean it like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeee
STRING: It's not like I
always want to go outside;

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf1c
STRING: I feel happy just going
out occasionally, like this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf28
STRING: [Chris] “If you say so...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5a
STRING: [Phorni] “Yes, I do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf70
STRING: Phorni's smile was decisive, and the topic was drawn to
a close.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf7c
STRING: Phorni said it herself, so I guessed she was happy with
the way things were.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfae
STRING: [Phorni] “But anyway, are we there yet?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc4
STRING: [Chris] “Almost. It's just around the next corner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff6
STRING: [Phorni] “What's it called?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x100c
STRING: [Chris] “‘Copert,’ which you'd have found out when we
got there. More importantly, you know the rules, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1048
STRING: [Phorni] “I know, I know. No talking to you when you're
talking with Fal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1068
STRING: [Chris] “And no getting angry if I ignore you. And also,
no going off anywhere.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a4
STRING: [Phorni] “Yes, yes, okay!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ba
STRING: I went over a number of rules that we had set for going
out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d0
STRING: Phorni could not be seen by anyone else, so she was
not supposed to talk to me unless it was absolutely
necessary.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e6
STRING: It wasn't a very pleasant feeling when people look at
you like you're strange for talking to yourself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10fc
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, it's just over there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x116c
STRING: [Clerk] “Good evening, welcome!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1182
STRING: The same server as last time greeted me, and guided
me to a table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x118e
STRING: We were here a little earlier than I was last time, so the
trattoria wasn't so crowded yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x119a
STRING: We were lucky as there were still plenty of two-person
tables left, so we had a lot of space.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b0
STRING: We would most likely be finished with dinner by seven
when it starts getting busy, so sharing a table with
someone wouldn't be a problem, either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c6
STRING: I helped Phorni down from my shoulder, and browsed
the menu that I didn't get to see last time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1200
STRING: [Phorni] “What are you going to order?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1216
STRING: [Chris] “I'll just get whatever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x122c
STRING: I kept my eyes on the menu while I responded, and did
my best not to move my lips when I spoke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x125e
STRING: [Phorni] “That person just now wasn't Fal, right? Is Fal
going to come and take your order?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x127e
STRING: [Chris] “No. I told you she works in the kitchen as a
cook.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1294
STRING: Straight after saying this, a server I had never seen
before came and took my order. Without looking at the
menu, I just ordered the same lasagne as last time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b4
STRING: Annoyed perhaps by the fact that the server wasn't who
she wanted to see, Phorni started to pester me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e6
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey, can I go and take a peek in the kitchen?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12fc
STRING: [Chris] “If it bothers you that much, go ahead... Just
don't trip over anything.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x131a
STRING: [Phorni] “The bathroom is over there, right? And past
that looks like a place that only staff can enter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x133a
STRING: [Chris] “Sure does.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x136c
STRING: [Phorni] “Drop me off over there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1382
STRING: [Chris] “Hmph... Fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ac
STRING: She really could be a pain sometimes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13b8
STRING: She looked like she didn't need much, but it turned out
that she was kind of high maintenance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ce
STRING: I placed Phorni on my hand, and then pretended to
scratch my head, using that motion to return her to my
shoulder. And that was when someone suddenly spoke
to me from behind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1404
STRING: [Fal] “Chris! Good evening!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x141a
STRING: [Chris] “Oh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1448
STRING: [Phorni] “...Eek!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x145e
STRING: I turned about in surprise, and the momentum of this
almost made Phorni fall from my shoulders.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1474
STRING: I scooped her up quickly, and pretended to straighten
my clothes to put her back on my shoulder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a6
STRING: [Phorni] “Grr...! Don't spin around so suddenly like that!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ee
STRING: [Fal] “Since you came back again, I guess that means
you like it here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x152a
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, could this be her?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1540
STRING: [Chris] “Good evening, Fal. And yeah, it's kind of nice
here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1556
STRING: I said Fal's name on purpose so that Phorni would know
it was her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1562
STRING: [Chris] “You're dressed casually today... Not working
tonight?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1594
STRING: [Fal] “Well... Actually, it seems that from today I can
finish up at six.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15cc
STRING: The boss just told me a moment ago.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15d8
STRING: [Chris] “What time do you usually work till?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15f6
STRING: [Fal] “Nine o' clock. So now my shift is a whole three
hours shorter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1614
STRING: [Fal] “I was informed quite suddenly, so I still had a lot
of things to do, which is why I'm still here, but I should
be able to finish up a little more smoothly in the
future.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x163e
STRING: [Chris] “Right... But, uh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1654
STRING: Wasn't it her choice, rather than the boss's, whether or
not she'd shorten her working hours like that?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x166a
STRING: Or was it a management decision, since Fal currently
had an important role in the kitchen?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1680
STRING: But if that were the case, it didn't make sense.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x168c
STRING: I had made a point of not really thinking about it thus
far, but it was strange that Fal would be working during
such an important time at school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ac
STRING: And as for the reason why she was working, it wasn't as
if I didn't have my own suspicions.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b8
STRING: However... When I looked at Fal, I found it hard to
believe I could be right, and I didn't have the heart to
ask.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ea
STRING: [Fal] “What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x171c
STRING: [Phorni] “What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1732
STRING: Both Phorni and Fal asked me the same thing, at almost
the exact same time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1748
STRING: Ignoring Phorni for the time being, I gave a vague
response.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1754
STRING: [Chris] “No, it's nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1786
STRING: [Fal] “It's about my part-time job, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x179c
STRING: [Chris] “What do you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17ba
STRING: [Fal] “I thought you might be wondering why my shift
got shorter. Or maybe why, if I was able to, had I not
shortened them up until now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17da
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180c
STRING: [Fal] “You don't need to be concerned, my pay isn't
going to change.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x182c
STRING: Fal's response hit the nail on the head, as if she had
understood my vague answer, my silence, everything...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1842
STRING: And that response spoke of just the beginning of what I
had wanted to know.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1874
STRING: [Phorni] “Why is Fal working?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x188a
STRING: Only I could hear Phorni's voice, and her question.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1896
STRING: Since we'd spoken about Fal a lot recently, I guess
Phorni had enough time to start thinking about why Fal
was working.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ac
STRING: And it seems that she now had the same suspicion that
I did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18d4
STRING: [Fal] “Do you mind if I eat with you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ea
STRING: [Chris] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x191c
STRING: [Fal] “I'm hungry. And there's something I wanted to talk
about, and that chair happens to be empty, so why not?
Or, are you waiting for someone?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x193c
STRING: [Chris] “No... I'm just here for dinner, so uh, have a seat.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1952
STRING: I recalled the whole reason why I brought Phorni here,
thanks to her suddenly tugging on my ear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1984
STRING: [Phorni] “Good boy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19a2
STRING: [Fal] “Okay, just give me a moment.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19c6
STRING: Just as I thought she was going to sit down, she
suddenly headed off into the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19dc
STRING: Was she going to cook something up for herself?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a04
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a1a
STRING: [Chris] “Hm...? What is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a4c
STRING: [Phorni] “She's quite pretty, huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a62
STRING: [Chris] “I suppose she is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a94
STRING: [Phorni] “She's quite nice, huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aaa
STRING: [Chris] “I guess so...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1adc
STRING: [Phorni] “And the two of you are practicing late every
day, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1af2
STRING: [Chris] “That part's wrong.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b24
STRING: [Phorni] “Really???”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b3a
STRING: [Chris] “Be quiet, she's coming back...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b50
STRING: In a small voice I silenced Phorni and shifted my gaze to
Fal, as if I'd simply been waiting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b8c
STRING: [Phorni] “I don't need to worry about being heard, you
know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bc8
STRING: [Fal] “Sorry to keep you waiting.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bde
STRING: [Chris] “Were you in the kitchen?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bfc
STRING: [Fal] “Yes, I just went straight into the kitchen and told
them what I wanted. I'd feel a little weird to have
someone come and take my order, and it's also just
faster this way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c26
STRING: [Chris] “Ohh, right. You wouldn't go as far as just
cooking it yourself, huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c58
STRING: [Fal] “Of course not. That'd be a waste of our dinner
time together.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c94
STRING: [Phorni] “Hrm!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1caa
STRING: Noticing that Fal had gone slightly red in the cheeks,
Phorni for some reason made a very unhappy face and
complained in my ear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cc0
STRING: I suppose she did so thinking of Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ccc
STRING: [Chris] “So, what did you order?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cfe
STRING: [Fal] “I chose a pasta. How about you, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d14
STRING: [Chris] “I got... The same thing as last time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d46
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, you really liked it, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d5c
STRING: [Chris] “Hm... I guess I did.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d8e
STRING: [Phorni] “You two really get along well...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da4
STRING: But what she said was most certainly true.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1db0
STRING: Fal was happy that we could have dinner together
again, and her cheeks were red. I had ordered the same
lasagne that she treated me to last time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dd0
STRING: The whole thing was meant to have been an
on-the-spot decision, and I hadn't intended for it to turn
out this way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ddc
STRING: But, it was true that I had taken a liking to this place
and the food, so I felt no need to make any corrections
or look at Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e0e
STRING: [Fal] “Well, your lasagne should be here soon. When I
was in the kitchen, I saw them putting in the final
touches.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e2e
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e46
STRING: I was probably being overly conscious of Phorni, as my
answer was a bit vague.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e5c
STRING: But even so, I did my best not to be too distant, and
passed the time until our meals arrived.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ec0
STRING: [Fal] “We didn't end up having much time to talk, did
we?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ed6
STRING: [Chris] “Not really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eec
STRING: My predicament aside, by the time Fal's meal had
arrived, the trattoria had started to get crowded, and it
soon felt hard to have a relaxed, quiet meal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f0c
STRING: We walked down a lane near the trattoria to an area
with some cover from the rain. Once there, Fal started
talking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f3e
STRING: [Fal] “I have to say, I'm glad that I have more time to
dedicate to practice, now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f5e
STRING: Fal said this cheerfully, and suddenly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f6a
STRING: [Chris] “Hm? Ahh, yeah, you must be happy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f9c
STRING: [Fal] “I have all of tomorrow off, but what about you?
Are you going to practice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fb2
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I'll practice something, I guess...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fe4
STRING: [Fal] “Practice something, you guess...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2012
STRING: Are you sure
that's the best attitude?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x203a
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey! You listen here, Chris works pretty hard
on Sundays, you know?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2072
STRING: I mean, sure, he doesn't do much on
other days when he's home, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2094
STRING: Oww!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ae
STRING: Pretending that I was wiping some rain off my shoulder,
I lightly flicked Phorni's forehead.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20c4
STRING: It almost sounded like she was defending me, but it
wasn't as if Fal could hear her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20da
STRING: But, I could somehow tell that Fal was just saying it out
of concern for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20f0
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway... That's more or less the plan.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2122
STRING: [Fal] “Well if that's the case, why don't we practice
tomorrow?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2138
STRING: [Chris] “Even though you have the day off?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x216a
STRING: [Fal] “Yes, there's that thing I wanted to tell you about,
too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2180
STRING: [Chris] “But going all the way to school on a day off...? I
don't know...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2196
STRING: I didn't dislike the idea of practicing itself, so I joked
around a little.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21c8
STRING: [Fal] “Then, somewhere that's not the school would be
fine?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21de
STRING: [Chris] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2210
STRING: [Fal] “Anywhere but school, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2226
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... I guess?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2258
STRING: [Fal] “In that case, do you want to come to my place?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x226e
STRING: [Chris] “Your place...? I'm not sure if...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22a0
STRING: [Fal] “Then, we'll just have to go to yours.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22b6
STRING: [Chris] “Whoa... Wait a sec.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22e8
STRING: [Fal] “That way you won't have to go to the trouble of
carrying your Fortelle, and I'm sure we won't get any
complaints for making noise in the day time around
that area.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2312
STRING: [Chris] “Those are all good points, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2344
STRING: [Fal] “Okay, perfect!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x235a
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry? ....Huh? That's not what I meant.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x238c
STRING: [Fal] “Are there any problems with what I just said?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23a2
STRING: [Chris] “My room needs some serious cleaning...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23d4
STRING: [Fal] “I like cleaning, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23ea
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x241c
STRING: [Fal] “Or is it that you just don't want to practice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2432
STRING: [Chris] “I didn't say that!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2464
STRING: [Fal] “So you want to practice, but you don't want to go
the school, and you don't want to go to my place,
either.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24a0
STRING: [Phorni] “Yikes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24b6
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24e8
STRING: [Fal] “And your place has your instrument, and we don't
have to worry about noise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2524
STRING: [Phorni] “I can hear her wrapping you around her little
finger.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x253a
STRING: I could see that for myself...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2562
STRING: [Fal] “So, if there's no problem with any of the things I
just mentioned, I guess that means...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2594
STRING: [Phorni] “Uh-oh, she's got you now, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25aa
STRING: I could see that, too...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25d2
STRING: [Fal] “You don't want to practice with me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2604
STRING: [Phorni] “Yep, she's definitely got you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x261a
STRING: [Chris] “It's not like that at all...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x264c
STRING: [Fal] “Which means?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2696
STRING: I couldn't just go and say I didn't want to practice, not
right here and now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26a2
STRING: It was true that I enjoyed rehearsing with Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26ae
STRING: It's just... Sunday was the day that...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26d6
STRING: [Phorni] “You get a letter from Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26ee
STRING: That's right.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26fa
STRING: Arie's letter will arrive tomorrow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2706
STRING: And it was most likely a letter with concerns about me
finding a partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2712
STRING: But, I wondered if me partnering up with Torta, as Arie
had desired, would lead to the result that Arie had
wanted...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2728
STRING: Now that we were only communicating by letter, the
one thing I clearly felt was that the distance between
Arie and I had become greater.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x273e
STRING: I wasn't sure if it was that feeling that I wanted to turn
away from, or if it was simply Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2754
STRING: [Chris] “Alright...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x276a
STRING: Before I knew it, I had spoken my answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2792
STRING: [Fal] “Really? I'm glad to hear it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27a8
STRING: Shaking off my hesitation, I decided that right now, the
only thing I should be thinking about was the
graduation recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27be
STRING: I gave Phorni a quick nod, and started to discuss the
plan for tomorrow with Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27e6
STRING: [Fal] “So, you're okay to start in the afternoon?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27fc
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I'm sorry we can't start in the morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x281a
STRING: [Fal] “Aha-ha. We'll be able to get in plenty of practice if
we keep at it until evening, anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x283a
STRING: [Chris] “Ugh... I don't know if I...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x286c
STRING: [Fal] “I'm kidding.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x289a
STRING: Even if it's practice, we can still enjoy
ourselves a little since it's the weekend.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28b0
STRING: [Chris] “That's a weight off my shoulders.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28e2
STRING: [Fal] “So, do you mind if we meet in front of Copert?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28f8
STRING: [Chris] “Sure, since it'll be around lunch time, shall we
grab a bite there first?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x292a
STRING: [Fal] “Hmm, why don't we decide that tomorrow?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2940
STRING: [Chris] “Hm? Well, either way works for me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2972
STRING: [Fal] “Okay, so, I'll see you tomorrow!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2988
STRING: [Chris] “See you then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29a2
STRING: She left me with a smile that told me she was pleased,
and headed off into the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29b8
STRING: After seeing her off, I started to head back to my place
when Phorni pulled my hair and stopped me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29f2
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey, is she really coming over?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a08
STRING: [Chris] “It certainly seems like it...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a3a
STRING: [Phorni] “Torta has barely visited before, and now Fal
already gets to?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a50
STRING: [Chris] “That's just how things worked out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a66
STRING: [Phorni] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a7c
STRING: [Chris] “Tell me, Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2aae
STRING: [Phorni] “Tell you what...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ac4
STRING: [Chris] “Are you bothered by Fal coming over?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2af6
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm not bothered, not really.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b24
STRING: Why are you asking
something like that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b3a
STRING: [Chris] “Well, I was just thinking, I don't actually live in
that apartment by myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b76
STRING: [Phorni] “W-What are you talking about?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ba4
STRING: Your parents
are the one's paying the rent, aren't they?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bd6
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm just, uh, freeloading and borrowing a bit of
space... So

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c0e
STRING: it's not like it's my place or anything, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c1a
STRING: [Chris] “Not sure why you're getting all flustered, but
you know it's not about who pays or whatever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c42
STRING: [Phorni] “I know, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c70
STRING: Hrmm, wait a minute! What are
you trying to say?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c86
STRING: [Chris] “I'm not trying to say anything, I was just asking.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cc2
STRING: [Phorni] “Ngh... O-Okay then...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cf0
STRING: I guess I don't mind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cfc
STRING: [Chris] “I see... Thanks, Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d2e
STRING: [Phorni] “You don't have to thank me over something
like that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d44
STRING: [Chris] “Really? Okay then!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d5a
STRING: Impersonating Fal, I finished up with a cheerful tone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d82
STRING: [Phorni] “Gah!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d98
STRING: [Chris] “Hey don't get angry, you're the one who said it!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dca
STRING: [Phorni] “I know I did...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2de0
STRING: [Chris] “Aha-ha, anyway!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e12
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey, that's my line!

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e40
STRING: ...Sheesh!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e4c
STRING: For the time being we were able to wrap things up
pleasantly, as if nothing had even come up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e62
STRING: Phorni wasn't angry, and I was able to avoid saying
something that would hurt Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e78
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, let's get going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e96
STRING: [Phorni] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2eac
STRING: With my belly satisfied and my body warmed up from
the meal, I hurried through the rain as I didn't want to
get cold.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ec2
STRING: [Chris] “Listen, it'd be a big help if you could not tell
Arie about all this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2efe
STRING: [Phorni] “Hm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f14
STRING: Phorni seemed a little surprised when I asked her this
on the way home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f2a
STRING: Contrary to what I had expected, Phorni didn't respond
angrily, she simply smiled quietly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f5c
STRING: [Phorni] “I guess that's best. I'll keep it a secret.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f9e
STRING: At this point in time, it would have been hard to say that
I didn't want to practice with her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2faa
STRING: It was true that I enjoyed rehearsing with Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fb6
STRING: It's just, Sunday was the day that...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fde
STRING: [Phorni] “You get a letter from Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ff6
STRING: Exactly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3002
STRING: [Chris] “Listen, Fal...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x303c
STRING: [Fal] “Hm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3052
STRING: [Chris] “I'm sorry, I've got something important to do
tomorrow that I just can't reschedule. I'll get my
practice in at night...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x308e
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, I see!

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30bc
STRING: I didn't even ask you if you were busy, did I?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30c8
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30fa
STRING: [Fal] “No no, it's me who should be saying that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3128
STRING: I was just trying to tease you a little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x315a
STRING: [Fal] “That's why I asked you in a way that was hard for
you to say no to, so don't worry about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3170
STRING: [Chris] “Oh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31a2
STRING: [Fal] “So, I guess I will see you again next week. Come
by the practice room if you have time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31b8
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31d6
STRING: [Fal] “Alright, I'll see you next time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31ec
STRING: [Chris] “See you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3206
STRING: Fal left me with a smile, and headed off into the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x321c
STRING: After seeing her off, I started to head back to my place
when Phorni pulled my hair and stopped me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3256
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey... Are you sure it was okay to do that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x326c
STRING: [Chris] “What do you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x329e
STRING: [Phorni] “She was a potential partner for your recital,
wasn't she?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32b4
STRING: [Chris] “I guess so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32e6
STRING: [Phorni] “Stop being so vague!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32fc
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x332e
STRING: [Phorni] “What are you gonna do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3344
STRING: [Chris] “I haven't decided yet. And besides, just because
I said no to her today doesn't mean we absolutely won't
be able to be partners in the future.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3382
STRING: [Phorni] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3398
STRING: [Chris] “You said so yourself, tomorrow is the day that
Arie's letter arrives.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33c0
STRING: [Phorni] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33d6
STRING: [Chris] “That's why it's okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3408
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x341e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3450
STRING: [Phorni] “Hehe!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3466
STRING: Phorni smiled happily,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3482
STRING: and closed her eyes and started humming like she often
does when she was in a good mood.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3498
STRING: If Fal had been coming over to practice tomorrow, I was
sure that Phorni wouldn't have been humming.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34ca
STRING: [Phorni] “I'll sing for you tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34f4
STRING: Saying just that, Phorni went back to her humming, and
I glided my fingers along the keys of my imaginary
Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x350a
STRING: I could hear every single note play in my mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3516
STRING: As I wandered home slowly, the faint sound of Phorni's
humming was like a whisper in my ear.
